227 
 
    Physics, Chemistry, ICT, Economics, Geography, 
Agricultural Science, Accounting, Mathematics.  
(v) OAU requires'O' level credit passes in another 
Language, African or European.  
(vi) OAU and IBADAN - 'O' level credit pass in Music is 
not compulsory.  
(vii) PHC acceptsfive (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language and any other four (4) subjects 
a credit pass in Music is an added advantage.  
(viii) UNIZIK does not require 'O' level credit pass in 
Music but does accept 'O' level pass in English 
Language.  
(ix) UNN a nd UYO require candidates to pass 
Audition which is held on the last Thursday and 
Friday of August every year.  
(x) UYO does not insist on a credit pass in Music at 
‘O’ level. If a candidate earns a Grade V certificate 
in the Associated Board of Royal School of Music  
(ABRSM) Examination or Music Society of Nigeria 
(MUSON) Examination, it will be an added 
advantage.  
  
UTME SUBJECT  
(i) BOWEN requires any of Literature in English or CRS as 
the other subject.  
(ii) LASU accepts Music plus any two (2) other 
subjects.IBADAN and UNIZIK accept any other three 
(3)Arts or Social Science subjects.  
(iii) MOUNTAIN TOP requires one (1) language subject 
and one (1) Social Science subjects.  
(iv) OAU accepts any three (3) subjects from Ar ts, Social 
Sciences or Sciences.  
(v) UNN and PHC accept any three (3) subjects.  
  
  
  
 
REQUIREMENTS
